office.name: Assistant Secretary of State for Administration

div.p: Congress authorized the appointment of two more Assistant Secretaries of State (58 Stat. 798) for a period of up to two years, on December 8, 1944. On May 26, 1949, The Department of State Organization Act (63 Stat. 111) authorized the appointment of 10 Assistant Secretaries of State, two of whom would also be titled Deputy Under Secretaries. The Under Secretary remained the second-ranking officer of the Department.
